heading: HB02421
0: AN ACT CONVERTING THE LOCAL ROAD FROM THE JUNCTION OF LANAO DEL NORTE INTERIOR CIRCUMFERENTIAL ROAD AT BARANGAY TAMBACON THROUGH BARANGAYS LEMONCRETE, SOMIORANG, POBLACION, AND BACK TO THE LANAO DEL NORTE INTERIOR CIRCUMFERENTIAL ROAD, ALL IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF MAGSAYSAY, PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE INTO A NATIONAL ROAD, TO BE KNOWN AS MAGSAYSAY CIRCUMFERENTIAL ROAD AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
